lemma radical_idealI: assumes "finite X" and "F \<subseteq> P[X]" and "f \<in> P[X]" and "x \<notin> X" and "\<V> (insert (1 - punit.monom_mult 1 (Poly_Mapping.single x 1) f) F) = {}" shows "(f::('x::{countable,linorder} \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>0 nat) \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>0 'a::alg_closed_field) \<in> \<surd>ideal F"
